alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN WESTCHESTER AND WESTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 318 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Kisco, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ossining, Peekskill, Mount Kisco, Mahopac, Carmel, Bedford, Yorktown Heights, Jefferson Valley, Putnam Valley, Croton-on-Hudson, Briarcliff Manor, Pleasantville, Armonk, Buchanan, and Golden`s Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
